sentences.sContent: an old custom that has vanished altogether
sentences.sCn: 一个彻底消亡的古老习俗

sentences.sContent: Congress could ban the procession altogether.
sentences.sCn: 国会可以完全禁止这次游行。

trans.tranOther: used to emphasize that something has been done completely or has finished completely
not wearing any clothes – used humorously
